title: Conjure Woodland Beings
content:
ngle: Create a vine surface, slowing down creatures, possibly Entangling them.

Fallen Lover: Summon a wood woad bound to your tree to fight alongside you.

Spike Growth: Shape a piece of ground into hard spikes. Movement is halfed. A creature walking on the spikes takes 2d4 Piercing damage for every 1.5m / 5ft it moves.

Grasp of the Forest: Weapon attacks can Entangle the target.

Magic Resistance: Has Advantage on Saving Throws against spells and other magical effects.

Nature's Step: You and
